about.description:
celiagg is a Cython wrapper for the popular Anti-Grain Geometry 2D vector
graphics library.
about.summary: Anti-Grain Geometry 2.4 for Python with Cython

name: celiagg
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "0.1.2" %}
{% set sha256 = "554265df9677e74d27415c0d8ed54c1f23d319ad8332db13f04281fb01c27182" %}

package:
  name: celiagg
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: celiagg-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://github.com/celiagg/celiagg/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [win or py34]
  script: python setup.py install

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - toolchain
    - pkg-config  # [not win]
    - numpy x.x
    - cython
    - freetype 2.6.*
  run:
    - python
    - numpy x.x
    - freetype 2.6.*

test:
  imports:
    - celiagg

about:
  home: https://github.com/celiagg/celiagg
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Anti-Grain Geometry 2.4 for Python with Cython'

  description: |
    celiagg is a Cython wrapper for the popular Anti-Grain Geometry 2D vector
    graphics library.
  dev_url: https://github.com/celiagg/celiagg

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jwiggins
